review_details:
Had a pleasant stay the appts are clean and kitchen ok for basic use
Would recommend hiring bikes 15 euros for week great way of getting about and exploring the town
Plenty of sunbeds around the pool and nice size pool for swim
We weren't expecting 5 stars as it was cheap holiday but pleased with size of appts

Had great morning fishing
Well worth a trip out with Captain Tasos
Drink and baguette provided for lunch
What you catch can take to local restaurant and they will cook it for you

Had a fab day yesterday on the trip,can highly recommend
The trip is well organised good spots for swimming and looking around local village
Excellent bbq lunch and bonus we saw dolphins

We have just got back from a weeks holiday and had a lovely relaxing week, the hotel staff were very helpful the food was great for breakfast and lunch but the evening meals could have better choice
The pool area and bar was great and plenty of sunbeds
There wasn't much entertainment but that suited us so we weren't disappointed

We went for meal as a family Tuesday night we waited along for our food even after other people arrived after us and got there food before it was very noisy the chairs scrape along the tiled floor
The food came out on a steaming very hot skillet still cooking so by the time it cooled down the onions etc underneath were burnt black and the meat was very chewy

We had a lovely trip out on the catamaran the captain and sailor were very friendly and helpful and told us about the island
The snorkeling was enjoyed by all and great that they take photos of your trip on the catamaran as well as in the water and are able to download them
A lovely lunch was provided with drinks
Very good value for money and we were picked up from Calte de Fuste and transported up by car

Lovely big apartments, very quiet location, nice pool but very cold, 5min walk to get to main street and beach, there is a bar 2min walk down the road which is part of the complex and a spar shop 2min walk.

We had a great family day out at the park, we paid extra and swam with the sealions which was well worth the extra money its 40 euors each to swim with them we were in the pool for nearly an hour you have a gift of a photo each and we paid 20 euros at the end for a cd of the photos which we had additional 160 photos, lots to see and do in the park and theres a great swimming pool and fun pool for kids.
